body.raw: ## Chapter 3 → Building Blocks of Mobile Apps and Threads ### Layouts and View Groups in Android Layouts in Android are subclasses of `ViewGroup` and are used to arrange child views in a particular manner on the screen. Each layout type has its own properties and behaviors for how it positions its children. ### Common Layout Classes - **ConstraintLayout**: Enables complex layouts with flat view hierarchy by using constraints between views. ```xml ``` - **LinearLayout**: Arranges views in a single column or row, either vertically or horizontally. ```xml
